resources.string: And as we wind on down the road Our shadows taller than our soul There walks a lady we all know Who shines white light and wants to show
You may say I\'m a dreamer But I\'m not the only one I hope some day you\'ll join us And the world will be as one
Here we are now, entertain us I feel stupid and contagious Here we are now, entertain us
She got a lot of pretty, pretty boys She calls friends How they dance in the courtyard Sweet summer sweat
Don\'t carry the world upon your shoulders For well you know that it\'s a fool who plays it cool By making his world a little colder
She\'s got eyes of the bluest skies As if they thought of rain I hate to look into those eyes and see an ounce of pain
When I\'m driving in my car And that man comes on the radio And he\'s telling me more and more About some useless information Supposed to fire my imagination
Someday I\'ll wish upon a star And wake up where the clouds are far Behind me Where troubles melt like lemon drops
Dirty old river, must you keep rolling Flowing into the night People so busy, make me feel dizzy
I hope you don\'t mind, I hope you don\'t mind That I put down in words How wonderful life is while you\'re in the world
How does it feel? How does it feel? To be without a home? Like a complete unknown?
She says I am the one (Oh, baby) But the kid is not my son (Hee-hee-hee, no-no-no, hee-hee-hee) Hoo!
Bittersweet memories That is all I\'m taking with me So good-bye Please don\'t cry
The ice age is coming, the sun\'s zoomin\' in Meltdown expected, the wheat is growin\' thin Engines stop running, but I have no fear
When there\'s no future, how can there be sin We\'re the flowers in the dustbin We\'re the poison in your human machine
Well, it\'s too late tonight To drag the past out into the light We\'re one, but we\'re not the same We get to carry each other, carry each other
Mama, just killed a man Put a gun against his head, pulled my trigger, now he\'s dead
Maybe I just wanna fly Wanna live, I don\'t wanna die Maybe I just wanna breathe Maybe I just don\'t believe
Sailors fighting in the dance hall Oh man! Look at those cavemen go It\'s the freakiest show
